transcription: Bai yi wani abu don dakatar da ciwon ba tare da duk radadin da na yi daga tiyata. Zai so mafita ga wannan matsalar amma da alama bai san abin da zai yi ba.

transcription: Sannu, an gano ni da mono makonni biyu da suka gabata kuma ina shirin yin farin ciki gobe. Alamar da nake ji ita ce ɗan gajiya.

transcription: Wannan dai shi ne karo na farko da na yi ciwon ciki a cikin watanni da dama, kuma ko a lokacin, shekaru da yawa ke nan da na yi motsa jiki daidai gwargwado.

transcription: Sannu, na kasance ina dimuwa lokacin da nake tsaye ba zato ba tsammani. Wannan yana faruwa ne lokacin da ya tashi ba zato ba tsammani daga kwanciya ko tsayin wurin zama. Na saba da hypostension orthostatic.
translation: Hi, I have been getting dizzy when standing suddenly.  This happens when standing up suddenly from a laying or prolonged sitting position.  I am familiar with orthostatic hypostension.

translation: (Why if I am gonna have this up to several months?)  Hello, It is a contusion or hematoma, which is nothing but a collection of blood underneath the skin.

transcription: Mun kira likitan jijiyoyinta, ta yi iƙirarin cewa magani bai haifar da canji ba kuma kawai ya buge shi cewa tana da lafiya. Bata taba saninta ba kafin a kama ta.
translation: We called her neurologist, she claims medicine did not cause change and just blows it off that she just is fine.  She never knew her before the seizure.

transcription: Mun kira likitan jijiyoyinta, ta yi iƙirarin cewa magani bai haifar da canji ba kuma kawai ya buge shi cewa tana da lafiya. Bata taba saninta ba kafin a kama ta.

translation: Hi I snore and wake up tired daily.  Sometimes, my nose is runny all day.  I have attached my CT report for your reference.  I just wanted to know if surgery necessary.

transcription: "Mo lọ sí dókítà, wọ́n sì ṣe abewo EKG, wọ́n sọ pé ó dára. Wọ́n ti ṣètò ìdánwò àìdára fún ọ̀sẹ̀ méjì tó ń bọ̀. Mo ti ń ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ fún àwọn ọjọ́ díẹ̀ sẹ́yìn."
translation: I went to the dr and had a EKG they said it was fine.  Scheduled a stress test for 2 weeks away.  Been feeling like this for the last few days.

transcription: O dàbí pe o ní iba, ó sì ń dun gan-an. Mo lọ sí ER, wọ́n sì sọ pé wọn kò rí ohunkóhun. Jọ̀ọ́, ṣàánú fún mi, mo ń sunkún.
translation: It feels like it has fever and is very painful.I went to ER and they said they coucouldn t find anything.  Please help me Im in tears.

transcription: "Pele, mo máa ń horun ,osi maa n remi tin baji lójoojúmọ́. Nígbà míràn, imu mi máa ń rọ̀ láti owurọ̀ títí di alẹ́. Mo ti fi ìròyìn CT mi ranṣẹ́ fún ìtọ́kasí rẹ. Mo fẹ́ mọ̀ bóyá iṣẹ́ abẹ̀ wà ní dandan."
translation: For allergies, I would suggest you allergy testing which will help you to identify and avoid the substances that are causing troubles to you.  Hope above measures will help you.
